CREDIT AGREEMENT

ARTICLE VI COVENANTS
Borrower shall maintain liquidity of not less than $25,000,000.
Section 6.02 Leverage Ratio. The Consolidated Leverage Ratio shall not exceed 4.00 to 1.00.

+----------+--------------+----------------+
| Period   | Max Leverage | Min Liquidity  |
+----------+--------------+----------------+
| Q3 2019  | 4.00x        | $30 million    |
| Q4 2019  | 3.75x        | $32 million    |
+----------+--------------+----------------+
